name: Move Along...
Lore: 'Obi-Wan used Jedi ''affect mind'' power to convince stormtroopers, ''These aren''t the droids you''re looking for.''',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to temporarily suspend a battle just initiated at a site where one of your Jedi is present. Draw destiny. That number of opponent''s characters with ability = 1 (your choice) must move away (for free), or are lost. Battle continues.',
